entry.title: White Baby Bear Pops - 24g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Espeez
Type: Candy
Price: 1.29

Little Bears for Any Occasion

     Brighten up someone's day with the sweet gift of an adorable, hand-made, bear-shaped lollipop. These baby bears are flavoured to taste like delicious Natural Sugar and come in a beautiful shade of pearl white, a tasty and presentable treat that's sure to make everyone smile. 

     Each lolly is individually wrapped, delivering a classy look that would make any candy bouquet look absolutely stunning. Perfect for weddings, bridal showers, baby showers, or any event in which you'd like to share fun and sweetness!

24g | 1 wrapped lollipop

entry.title: Chupa Chups Zugen-Maler Lollipops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chupa Chups
Type: Candy
Price: 0.49

Stock up the pantry with iconic lollipops.

Paint your tongue sweet.

Colour your tongue with these classic Chupa Chups Tongue Painters Lollipops. These gourmet lollipops are fruity and tangy and come in the delicious flavours of cherry, orange and cola. So they paint your mouth red, yellow or black. 

Chupa Chups Lollipops have been around since the late 1950s and candy lovers have sucked on them ever since. Actually, the idea for the name came from the Spanish verb chupar, meaning "to suck". In 1969 the idea for the iconic logo was created by Salvador Dali. We all know who he is. 

1 Pop

entry.title: Chupa Chups XXL Lollipops - 29 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chupa Chups
Type: Candy
Price: 0.99

Blow The Biggest Bubbles!

Chupa Chups Lollipops with Bubble Gum Center

These Chupa Chups lollipops are the XXL size of the classic Chupa Chups pops with a surprise bubble gum center. Urban legend has it that you can blow the biggest bubbles with this lollipop! They come in 3 amazing flavours of strawberry, apple-strawberry and cola-strawberry.

  • Stock up with this 60 Count Container
  • 3 Yummy Flavours
  • Bubble Gum Center
  • 3 cm in diameter
  • Decorative storage bin

29 g Lollipops 

The Freshest Lollipops Shipped Fast!

Ingredients:

Sugar, glucose syrup, chewing mass, acidulant (citric acid, lactic acid), humectant (glycerine), colourants (beetroot, capsanthin, curcumin), aromas, malt extract (BARLEY), emulsifier (SOY LECITHIN), antioxidant (E321) .;

Allergen info: soy and barley. May contain traces of milk.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Dum Dums Pops - 100 Count
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spangler Candy
Type: Candy
Price: 7.99

10 million Dum Dum Pops are made every day

With 10 million Dum Dum Pops being made each and every day, you know you'll be missing out if you don't try this tempting treat. This 100-count bag will keep you and your family all stocked up for a while. And it's the perfect candy package to have on hand as Halloween Candy

Delicious and yummy flavours including Blue Raspberry, Cotton Candy, Cream Soda, Root Beer, Butterscotch, Watermelon, Sour Apple, Peach-Mango, Raspberry Lemonade, Grape, Blueberry, Strawberry, Fruit Punch, Cherry, Bubblegum, Orange, and the famous Mystery Flavour.

  • Made in the USA
  • Individually Wrapped
  • Kosher
  • Peanut Free
  • Tree Nut Free
  • Gluten-Free

488 g | 100 Count Bag

entry.title: Astro Pop Original - 1.5 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Leaf
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

Original Old Fashioned Astro Pop Lollipop

You might end up in an alternate universe, that's just how delicious the Astro Pop is! The old-fashioned Astro Pop is made to resemble a rocket and comes in a trio of fruity flavours. Cherry, Passionfruit and Banana are what really give the retro Astro Pop Lollipop such irresistible taste! Truly, a blast from the past, The Astro Pop has been loved since 1963!

  • Flavour layers: Cherry, passion fruit, banana

  • Kosher Certified Parve

  • Gluten-Free

1.5 oz. 

Ingredients:

Sugar, corn syrup, water, artificial flavours, colour added (includes red 40, yellow 5, blue 1), glycerin.

entry.title: Tootsie Pops
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tootsie Roll Industires
Type: Candy
Price: 0.49

Best Selling Lollipop in the World!

Tootsie Pops are an iconic lollipop and the number one selling lollipop in the world! Coming in a variety of flavours, Orange, Grape, Cherry Chocolate. Tootsie Pops include the delicious old-fashioned Tootsie Roll candy in middle. With a hard candy coating on the outside, the centre is delicious and so chewy! It's like two treats in one! Tootsie Pops Lollipops are mouthwatering and so irresistible!
  • Assorted Flavours include: Orange, Cherry, Grape and Chocolate
  • Gluten-Free
  • Kosher Certified Dairy
1 Pop

Ingredients:

Sugar, corn syrup, partially hydrogenated soybean oil, citric acid (may contain malic acid), condensed skim milk, cocoa, whey, artificial and natural flavours, soya lecithin, artificial colours (FD&C red 40, yellow 5, blue 1), strawberry powder.
